name: react-parse-htmlstring
description: Parse any string that you can 'dangerouslySetInnerHTML' or even return as a React component on a html tag of your choice!

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd
scripts.prerelease: npm run clean && npm run check
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release
scripts.demo:push: cd demo/dist && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update demo' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'update demo' && git push git@github.com:jaosimt/react-parse-htmlstring gh-pages --force
scripts.demo:publish: npm run demo:clean && npm run demo:build && npm run demo:push

author: Sim Jao
